# Description

The function returns times series of the evolution of different production surface areas' ecological footprints over the years for one or more selected countries. 

# Shiny app

The user can choose one or more countries, a record type, an indicator, the years she/he is interested in visualizing the evolution over time and an option to display forecasts or not.
